Job Description:Job Title – Rates Business Management & ControlLocation - Mumbai  Role DescriptionThe Business Management Specialist is responsible for ensuring the execution of activities from the wide range of Business Management tasks, either directly responsible for task execution or indirectly responsible via the efforts of other team members.  The Business Manager Specialist’s responsibilities may include all or some of the following, financial planning and business forecasting, reporting output quality and performance metrics, ensuring satisfactory infrastructure and control function service level delivery and supplier sourcing and pricing negotiations. In addition, the Business Management Specialist may be responsible for analyzing the impact of changes and evaluating the corresponding changes to cost and the impact to the forecast. The Business Management Specialist is responsible for defining, implementing and continuously improving policies, processes and procedures that deliver consistent and reliable products and services. The Business Management Specialist may oversee the work of Lead Business Management Analysts and/ or Business Management Analysts.What we’ll offer youAs part of our flexible scheme, here are just some of the benefits that you’ll enjoyBest in class leave policy

Complementary Health screening for 35 yrs. and aboveYour key responsibilitiesSupporting business performance deep dives and year end planning
Extensive support on expense analysis and cost reduction initiatives.
Supporting New business initiatives via NPA, NTAs
Support the business in audit and regulatory requests/reviews.
Pro-actively tracking and resolution of control gaps identified via Audit findings, SII’s etc.
Supporting the team in effectively running governance forums (NFR, Product Forum, Volker Review meetings).
Onboarding of Dealer-to-Dealer counterparties on venues for risk sweeps
Assist the desk with Control projects around monitoring of Cancels, Corrects & Amends (CCA) cases, ensuring timely PnL signoffs, Trader Mandate breaches, advisory role on Accountable Client Owner (ACO)/ Know Your Client (KYC), Vendor Risk Management, etc.
Building and maintaining strong partnerships with stakeholders across Front Office and Infrastructure domains.Your skills and experienceUnderstanding of the Rates asset class.
